title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 7.2 - General regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 7.2 - General regulations

State Regulations

Local school authorities may require for any teaching
position a professional or academic standard higher than that prescribed by the
commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
7.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
